name: Wooden Hearts (new version)
description:
Story:

In the last years plenty of children went missing. You have one last clue left that led you to a n old and mysterious place. Equipped with your lamp you go to investigate.

What are you going to find out?

Gameplay:

This is a horror game with puzzle elements. There are JUMPSCARES but if you don't like puzzle elements in games then maybe this isn't for you.

Info:

I used Asset Forge to create my own stuff and also used some assets from Kenney - Graveyard Kit. I worked on this project alone for a short period of time so please forgive me I you think some mechanics are a too clunky.

This game started as a game for the Scream Jam 2019: https://mikorashu.itch.io/wooden-hearts-demo.

I continued working on it and this is what it became.

I will fix bugs but for the most part this is the full game.

If you encounter any game breaking bug please let me know!

Thanks for stopping by and have fun playing the game!
